content: done on my own pages though — also if you think like this try reading two of my pieces, we might have a different paradigm on love but we say pretty much the same things. these essays are part of my memoir of living through some stuff and finding a deep truth within — that of love and the nature of reality Travelling the Alphabet — L is for LoveThat much needed key essential in all our lives that is about the most misunderstood emotion possible. Yet we are all…medium.com Travelling the Alphabet, B is for BlissTraveling the Alphabet — B is for Bliss.medium.co
